messages.subject: Re: FIC:  Conflicting Confessions; PMK; Souji, Toshi, Kichi; R
messages.msgSnippet: ... Ah, yes.  Souji s mysterious I couldn t get to sleep.  There s something that s been weighing on my mind.  And then a minute later Toshi saying He was
messages.messageBody:
>>>What brought about this fic? Well... remember episode 16-17
>>>where ...the unforgettable Kichisaburou appeared in the Okita
>>>impersonator arc? Yes, yes, that's it. I vividly remember Toshi
>>>saying something to this effect: "Souji? It can't be. He was in my
>>>room until late last night." And then there were the naughty
>>>thoughts: what were they doing?


>>>The fic is set in episode 17: just before the scene with Tetsu and
>>>Souji enjoying the view of the night sky.



Ah, yes. Souji's mysterious "I couldn't get to sleep. There's
something that's been weighing on my mind." And then a minute later
Toshi saying "He was with me in my room until late." That was my
first thought too - what were they doing that was now weighing on
Souji's mind?...

Thanks for the fic. It fills in that mysterious gap in a fun way! I
especially liked the bit "unless the rest of the first unit was
waiting just down the hall." I'm glad Toshi's thinking they would be
so loyal to their captain.

And, a thanks to everyone who provided all the info and links during
the TB discussion. I have a much better understanding now.
